name: certificate-sharing
description: Script otomatis untuk berbagi akses sertifikat di Google Drive

scripts.clean:exe: rm -f build/*.exe build.exe || true; mkdir -p build
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:exe && pkg certificate-monitor.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/certificate-monitor-win.exe && pkg certificate-worker.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/certificate-worker-win.exe && pkg folder-mapper.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/folder-mapper-win.exe

author: Freelance Script
